Name: OneConfigFile
Instructions: Yes/No. If "Yes", program will generate one combined config file for all databases. If "No", one individual file for each DB will be generated.

Name: OneConfigFileName
Instructions: Specify file name for the one combined config file.

Name: ExtTableShemaPrefix
Instructions: Prefix to internal schema name that can be used for external schema name for data migration purpose. If internal schema is named ABC, the new schema will become EXTM_ABC that will hold all external tables.

Name: ExtTablePrefix
Instructions: If you want to prefix each table. Empty is recommended if you have "ExtTableShemaPrefix" already defined (not empty).

Name: InputObjectsFolder
Instructions: This is where output of step 3 is stored

Name: SchemaMappingFileFullPath
Instructions: This is the same schema mapping file that step 2 used.

Name: ApsExportScriptsFolder
Instructions: This is where APS Export T-SQL Scripts will reside.

Name: SynapseImportScriptsFolder
Instructions: This is where Synapse Import T-SQL Scripts will reside.

Name: SynapseCopyScriptsFolder
Instructions: This is where Synapse COPY INTO T-SQL Scripts will reside.

Name: ExternalDataSourceName
Instructions: Name of the external data source. Default Value to start with. However, this can be updated for some individual tables once the config file is generated.

Name: FileFormat
Instructions: Name of the external file format. Default Value to start with. However, this can be updated for some individual tables once the config file is generated.

Name: ExportLocation
Instructions: Example of the final location for one table inside the DB "AdventureWorksDW": "/migration/testrun/AdventureWorksDW/dbo_DimCustomer"
